text:
This whole *report* about 🇰🇷 successful #COVID19 💊 #treatment💊  with CQ + Zn still hasn't been confirmed. 

But the proposed mechanisms from the research seemed plausible no? 🤔

Another mystery to solved I guess, as other 🏥 experimenting with that combo too.  

#Chloroquine https://t.co/UYluGmGdlL
